prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that blends into the night with a mysterious aura and floating characteristics.
Imagine a spooky Pokemon with a mischievous smile and glowing eyes, perfect for tricking adventurers.
Show me a Pokemon that haunts dark forests, featuring swirling mist and eerie colors to frighten its foes.
Design a ghostly creature with a playful personality, ready to play pranks on unsuspecting trainers in urban areas.
Generate a Pokemon with a shadowy form, emphasizing shades of blue and purple, surrounded by wisps of energy.
Make a Pokemon that embodies mystery and allure, with an elegant floating motion and a captivating gaze.
Give me a ghost-type Pokemon that thrives in caves, bringing an air of enchantment and spookiness to its habitat.
